sentences.sContent: The first thing to do is book a venue.
sentences.sCn: 首先要做的是预订一个会场。

sentences.sContent: The band will play (= perform at ) as many venues as possible.
sentences.sCn: 那支乐队将在尽可能多的地方演出。

synos.tran: 审判地；犯罪地点；发生地点；集合地点

remMethod.val: ven(来) + ue → 大家都来的地方 → (聚集、 审判、 比赛等的)地点

trans.tranOther: a place where an organized meeting, concert etc takes place
